text: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَنْ عِندَهُۥ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَلَا يَسْتَحْسِرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan kepunyaan-Nya-lah segala yang di langit dan di bumi. Dan malaikat-malaikat yang di sisi-Nya, mereka tiada mempunyai rasa angkuh untuk menyembah-Nya dan tiada (pula) merasa letih.
